mapper.select: select id, name, hierarchy, franchisee_id, store_id, operator_rate, franchisee_rate, operator_rate_other, franchisee_rate_other, store_rate, status, type, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_division_account_config where id = #{id}
select 1 from t_division_account_config where del_flag=0 and name = #{name} and tenant_id=#{tenantId} LIMIT 1
select id, name from t_division_account_config where del_flag=0 and name = #{name} and tenant_id=#{tenantId} order by id LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_division_account_config(name, hierarchy, franchisee_id, store_id, operator_rate, franchisee_rate, operator_rate_other, franchisee_rate_other,store_rate, status, type, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{hierarchy}, #{franchiseeId}, #{storeId}, #{operatorRate}, #{franchiseeRate}, #{operatorRateOther}, #{franchiseeRateOther}, #{storeRate}, #{status}, #{type}, #{tenantId}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_division_account_config
name = #{name},
hierarchy = #{hierarchy},
franchisee_id = #{franchiseeId},
store_id = #{storeId},
operator_rate = #{operatorRate},
franchisee_rate = #{franchiseeRate},
operator_rate_other = #{operatorRateOther},
franchisee_rate_other = #{franchiseeRateOther},
store_rate = #{storeRate},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
